flawed_nl_solution:
2000 x 0.25 = <<2000*0.25=500>>500
The loser got 45% of the votes because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
The winner got 275 votes because 500 x 0.55 = <<500*0.55=275>>275
The loser got 252 votes because 500 x 0.45 = <<500*0.45=252>>252
The winner got 23 more votes because 275 - 252 = <<275-252=23>>23
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 225, not 252. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
